title: International Women’s Day: Shine on those leading the path in the Korean startup ecosystem - KoreaTechDesk | Korean Startup and Technology News

quotes: South Korea has made impressive economic progress over the past 50 years, from one of the world’s poorest countries to an industrial and technology powerhouse.

quotes: Only about 10 percent of managerial positions in South Korea are held by women, the lowest among the countries studied by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development.
